mods.abstract: Video recording opening on the parking lot outside of the church. Professor Ralph W. Hood stands next to the churchâ€™s sign before walking into the massive building. The recording shows the interior of the church with its high vaulted ceilings and many rows of pews. The camera moves forward to the altar and reveals the sound system and piano before continuing to pan around the altar area. Hood speaks with a man as the camera continues to take in the building. A central feature of which is a bath. A man tells the crew that almost the whole church was built by the congregation.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
